All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
addItemFragment
The addItemFragment class is a fragment that displays a series of editable fields.
addItemViewModel
A view model to manage the data for the addItemFragment.
chooseFilterFragment
Manages the screen that enables users to choose filtering conditions.
EditItemFragment
Shows the details of a single item and allows a user to edit these details.
EditItemViewModel
A view model to manage the data for the EditItemFragment.
filteredItemsFragment
Manages the screen that displays the list of items filtered by the requested conditions.
filterItemsTest
Tests the functionality of the filtering functions in chooseFilterFragment Ensures the items are properly filtered on basis of the user's input
HomeFragment
Shows the list of items being tracked by the application.
HomeViewModel
A view model to manage the data for the HomeFragment.
Item
A representation of an item within the context of an inventory management system.
ItemAdapter
Displays the items being tracked by the inventory manager to the user.
ItemFunctionalityTest
Conducts comprehensive UI testing on fragments and item-related functionalities.
ItemTest
Tests the functionality of the Item() class.
ItemUtility
This is a utility class that contains helpful methods for handling item-related operations and validations.
ItemViewModel
The means by which the system interacts with the backend database.
LoginActivity
On app start, the user is met with the Login Activity.
MainActivity
The main activity in which the entire application operates.
ProfileFragment
Shows the user details of the user currently logged into the application.
ProfileViewModel
A view model to manage the data for the profile fragment.
sortedItemsFragment
Manages the screen that displays the list of items sorted by the requested conditions.
sortItemsTest
Tests the functionality of the sorting functions in SortOptionsFragment Ensures the items are properly sorted on basis of the user's input
SortOptionsFragment
Manages the screen that enables users to choose sorting conditions.
ViewItemFragment
Shows the details of a single item.
ViewItemViewModel
A view model to manage the data for the ViewItemFragment.
ViewTesting
Conducts comprehensive UI testing.
